profile:
Reborn Renovations is a multiple award-winning custom home renovation company that provides a full range of interior & exterior home renovation services.
 
Reborn provides the highest level of general contracting and top-quality workmanship for all your Calgary, Okotos, Airdrie, Cochrane, and surrounding area home renovation needs. Sales coordinators, interior designers, and project managers are supplied for every job to ensure timelines are met and your renovation runs as smooth as possible while delivering the look you desire and staying on budget.
 
Our home renovation services include:

- Whole Home Renovations
- Multiroom Renovations
- Custom Home Builds
- Kitchen Renovations
- Basement Developments and Renovations 
- Bathroom Renovations
- Exterior Renovations
- Home Additions
- Home Extensions
- 2nd Floor Additions
- Garage Additions
- New Home Builds
- Infill Builds
- Acreage and Estate Builds

profile:
Since launching in 2011 we have had the pleasure of working with hundreds of families developing their basements. During this time, we have worked hard to gather feedback and learn as much as we can about how to make this process as smooth and enjoyable as possible.

We look at every basement development with a focus on creating a great space for you and your family to enjoy, while also maximizing your home equity. By providing our services at a highly competitive price point, we ensure that you will see the money that you spend on your basement back when you go to sell your home down the road.

ReImagine Builders is the parent company of:

ReImagineBasements.com - specializing in new basement developments starting at $20,000 or $190/month

ReImagineGarages.com - specializing in new detached garage builds from $17,500 or $170/month.

Our aim is to be the most reliable service provider in our industry. profile:
Choosing who to trust with your renovation project or custom home build is a big decision. You want someone who will look after your home as if it were their own; someone who will listen to you and guide you through the design, selection and construction processes; someone you can rely on with absolute confidence to do the job right.

Dependable Renovations is an owner-operated business that combines our wealth of knowledge in both new home construction and residential renovations with the care and attention to detail that only comes when dealing directly with business owners. No one cares for our company and our clients like we do!

Our team of professional suppliers and sub-trades are the upper echelon of the construction industry; dealing only with those holding standards as high as our own ensures we are able to deliver stunning results every single time. Our attention to quality workmanship and post-completion service gives you peace of mind knowing that every facet of your project will be handled with care; even years down the road.

We realize that relationships are key, and go to great lengths to create a connection with each client. A renovation or custom build is not simply putting up drywall and painting a few walls; it’s about creating a positive change in your home that will last for years to come!

Our Renovation and Custom Home Building Services include:
* Full Home Renovations
* Gourmet Kitchens
* Custom Basement Developments
* Luxury Bathrooms
* Exterior Make-Overs
* Basement, Main Floor and 2nd Floor Additions
* Custom Home Builds

profile:
Maple Renovations is a professional Calgary renovations company that specializes in bathroom renovations, kitchen renovations and basement renovations. Alongside our high-quality renovation services, we also provide custom carpentry solutions as well as general services.

What Makes Maple Renovations Special?

There are a few things that help Maple Renovations stand out as a premium renovations company in Calgary. We are a family owned and operated business and have been ever since the company was established. Our friendly and family run custom service means that you will get a team of home renovation experts that you can trust. Another stand out feature that Maple Renovations has is our worldwide experience. In addition to Canada, members of our team have worked in locations all over the world, including the UK, France and Spain. This international experience is just one of the factors that makes up the vast experience of Maple Renovations and has helped position our company as a leader in the Calgary renovations industry.

Created with a passion for the construction industry, we strive to create spaces our clients want to show off. We joined this industry about 20 years ago and have not skipped a beat. When the owners are not busy working on-site or designing spaces, they can be found enjoying family time and some well-deserved rest and relaxation. 

We pride ourselves on our ability to create relationships with our customers, build trust & deliver a quality renovation. At Upright, it is important to us that every customer feels welcome, educated & spoiled. Because who doesn't like to be spoiled?

profile:
Started as Pircon General Contracting Ltd. focused on Commercial Leasehold Improvements and Retail Construction, Pircon Group has grown into many sectors of building and construction since its inception in 2015. Along with Commercial Design, Engineering and General Contracting services, Pircon Group has been offering its Residential Design and Construction services in Calgary and Area. Specializing in Custom Home Construction, Single Family and Multifamily New Construction, Pircon Group also provides Full Scale Home Renovations, Home Additions, Custom Kitchen Renovations and Basement Renovations.

We are team of talented and highly skilled individuals with construction and project management background. We understand what it takes to successfully bring a project to its completion that represents your dreams.  Our dedicated team is an asset to any project we take on. With our combined construction experience of over 35 years, our team ensures each project is planned and executed for definite success 

We have constructed over 100,000 SQFT of commercial space and turned that into successful businesses and we have converted over 30,000 SQFT of residential space into your dream reality and space that you call home!

profile:
When it comes to custom decks, you are only limited by your imagination. At Serenity Construction, we will be by your side every step of the way to help you sort through your deck ideas and choose materials. Here are some features to consider:

***
 
Separate or sunken seating area
Custom built benches
Attached gazebos/pergola
Wrap around deck
Multi-level deck
Staircases, railings, and gates
We also offer deck sealing and finishing services to protect and enhance the appearance of your deck!

***
 
With many types of fences to choose from, ranging from beautiful, high caliber wood to affordable, quality plastic and vinyl options, Serenity Construction has something for everyone, no matter how big or small their budget is.

***
 
An essential part of the process is the initial consultation where we discuss what the client's aims are; only once that has been completed do we move forward with the construction phase. Based on what your goals are for your new fence, our fencing experts can recommend a particular building material that is best suited.

***
 
Is your intention to keep deer and other animals out of the garden? To prevent the household pet from escaping? Before we start installing anything, we take the time to understand what the reason behind the fence is, which helps us to determine the appropriate height and length for it. Through this, Serenity Construction is able to consistently provide our Calgary clients with fencing solutions that best fit their needs.

profile:
Project-Tek Inc. has over 30 years of experience in the renovation industry - What we do is not unusual, but how we do it is. Let our knowledge of remodeling and renovations, provide you with excellence in installation, design, and workmanship.

When we decided to bring in our 30+ years of industry experience into opening Project-Tek Inc. in 2013, we knew the kind of service and results we wanted to provide to our clients.

Our goal is to offer Calgary and surrounding area homeowners with budget-friendly bathroom remodeling and home renovations, with beautiful results they will love for a lifetime

You will notice the difference in how we do things right from the start. Our attention to detail shows with every project we undertake. We do not use pushy sales tactics and we take the time to educate our customers, so they can decide what is right for their home.

Project-Tek Inc. uses only quality products, and our in-house install provide flawless workmanship and allows us to maintain our remarkably high standards.

Premium results without the premium price. Even though we insist on the best for our customers, we still find ways to keep our prices competitive. This allows us to deliver value-driven service on all our projects.


Why choose us...

-Convenience... we come to you

-We provide you with a detailed and written estimate based on your needs and budget

-We guarantee you a job done right, the first time.

-We supervise all aspect of our services

-We have over three decades of experience in the renovation industry

-We are licensed, insured, and bonded

-We provide customer education on all aspect of our services

-We respect your environment and your home

-We love what we do...



​For a free in home consultation, please contact us at (403) 861-8324

profile:
Welcome to M & S Developments. We have spent many years in a variety of industries collecting experience in cabinetry and painting and 7 years in renovations and 5 years in steelwork and cladding. 

Basement Renovations: drywall, lumber framing, steel stud framing, firewall installation, painting, entertainment room - custom or built in cabinetry, trim, tiling, flooring installations (cork, laminate, hardwood, tiling, vinyl). 

Kitchen Planning and Renovation - Counters (we do subcontract for this) spray painting, stain, lacquer on custom cabinetry, backsplashes, flooring installation. 

Decks: Design, Permits, Building and Framing, railings (metal/glass/wood), stairs, BBQ gas installation (with Licensed gas installers) to ensure we're building the deck and outdoor area that you want. 

Outdoor Building Services: Sheds, carports and outbuildings. 

We do sub contract to licensed plumbers and electricians if you need this type of service done. 

Covid 19 - We are following all the health and safety guidelines and will be wearings masks and social distancing while on site to ensure the safety of our customers and employees. 


Contact us today to schedule your appointment. We'll come out to do a walk through and discuss your project needs in further detail.  Our alternative phone number is 403-831-4655.

profile:
JSM Innovations performs all forms of builds and renovations as a general contractor. Many aspects of the work are performed in-house while more specialized fields are contracted to our trusted sub trade partners. All aspects of the work are supervised by Jason Mifsud to ensure that the quality is completed to the highest level. JSM Innovations is also a Condominium Specialist performing rebuilds after insurance losses to water, flood, and fire. All aspects of our rebuilds meet or exceed current Fire Code and Building Code, and meet or exceed building finish quality prior to the loss. JSM Innovations perform:
 
Basement Renovations
Kitchen Renovations
Flooring Renovations
Repaint/new paint
Mechanical and Electrical Updates
Additions
New Builds
Turn-key Fix & Flips
Rental Grade updates
 
We will also visit suppliers and go in-depth with the best quality materials for your home renovations, and also can consult on interior designers. 
 
Call or text for a free estimate and book your in-home visitation at 403-860-8116! 
We can also be reached via email at jason@jsminnovations.ca
 
Check out our Instagram for more visuals:
https://www.instagram.com/jsm_innovations/
services: Installs, Flooring, Kitchens, Bathrooms, and Basements, New Home Builds (complied with provincial and national warranty), and more!
specialities: Restoration after Water Damage, Specialized in condos and multiunit condos, Kitchen Flooring Renos, Bathroom, and Wheelchair Accessibility!

profile:
IMAGINE - CREATE - ENJOY

As the premier custom home builder and luxury renovation experts of Calgary and Airdrie area, we put our 20+ years of experience to work for you. 

PRO Connect is your complete home development and renovation one-stop shop for all of your design, engineering, and construction needs. We are a team of skilled professionals providing construction, engineering, architectural, and design expertise. PRO Connect leverages over 200 years of professional team knowledge and experience in new construction, renovation, and engineering of both residential and commercial structures around Canada.

Our expansive knowledge in all aspects of project management, safety, and construction ensures that your project receives high-quality, innovative, and comprehensive solutions every step of the way to completion. We believe in providing every project, no matter the size, with exceptional work and focus on quality.
services:

- Acreage and Estate Builds

profile:
Established in 2011 we service Calgary and area with professional renovation and architectural home building services. Our specialty is large renovations and additions.

Building a new home or renovating can be one of the most exciting achievements in life and equally it can be one of the most stressful!  Kavaleer Homes Ltd. has the skills and experience to take away the stress so you can truly enjoy the journey.

Kavaleer Homes manages the on-site construction but also the paper work and administrative aspects that are involved. This begins with concept drawings, plans and consent, flowing through to construction, coordinating subcontractors, inspections, warranty, quality control and client variations and satisfaction.

With new homes comes an endless possibility of new ideas, and there is no better time to explore these options.
